value.title: AI could grow so powerful it replaces experienced professionals within 10 years, Sam Altman warns
value.excerpt: Tech leaders, such as OpenAI's Sam Altman and Google's Sundar Pichai, posted essays this week, arguing in favor of regulating artificial intelligence as the tech becomes smarter.

value.title: The Security Hole at the Heart of ChatGPT and Bing
value.excerpt: Indirect prompt-injection attacks can leave people vulnerable to scams and data theft when they use the AI chatbots.

value.title: Singapore’s AI-Based Marketing Unicorn Raises $105 Million To Finance M&A
value.excerpt: Insider, an AI-powered marketing platform, said it has raised another $105 million from Qatar Investment Authority (QIA) and Istanbul-based buyout firm Esas Private Equity. The company said its latest funding round gives it a valuation of almost $2 billion.

value.title: Bank, fintech collaboration to improve financial services
value.excerpt: A strategic partnership of banks, fintech and mobile financial services (MFS) could boost Bangladesh’s banking sector by delivering better, cheaper and more inclusive services, according to the top executives of some lenders in the country.

value.title: The Trump-DeSantis showdown is now official, and artificial intelligence is right in the middle of it
value.excerpt: In a video posted by Trump, DeSantis and Elon Musk are joined on Twitter Spaces by Adolf Hitler, the FBI, Dick Cheney, George Soros, and Klaus Schwab.

value.title: An early warning system for novel AI risks

value.title: Meta's AI Breakthrough: Defying User Tracking Policies, Billions Await!
value.excerpt: The Financial Times reported that Meta Platform (META) has been using AI to circumvent the impact of user tracking policies.

value.title: Snowflake acquires Neeva to add generative AI-based search to Data Cloud
value.excerpt: Neeva, which uses large language models to offer an AI-based search experience, is latest company to be picked up in Snowflake's acquisition spree.

value.title: DataStax taps ThirdAI to bring generative AI to its database offerings
value.excerpt: The partnership will see the Apache Cassandra-based database take advantage of ThirdAI’s Bolt technology to achieve better AI training performance on CPUs.

value.title: The Hollywood Writers’ Strike: 3 Reasons Not To Back Down On AI
value.excerpt: There's no stopping the development of AI but there are ways to protect humans from being replaced by it. Here are three reasons Hollywood writers cannot afford to back down on the subject.

value.title: Former Google CEO Warns AI Could Cause People To Be ‘Harmed Or Killed’
value.excerpt: Eric Schmidt, who served as Google’s chief executive from 2001 to 2011, said artificial intelligence poses “existential risks.”

value.title: The First Rule Of Regulating AI Is To Demonstrate A Problem Exists
value.excerpt: AI doomers put the metaphorical cart before the horse, jumping to a foregone policy conclusion without providing supporting evidence.

value.title: Automate document validation and fraud detection in the mortgage underwriting process using AWS AI services: Part 1
value.excerpt: In this three-part series, we present a solution that demonstrates how you can automate detecting document tampering and fraud at scale using AWS AI and machine learning (ML) services for a mortgage underwriting use case. value.title: 3 ways OpenAI says we should start to tackle AI regulation
value.excerpt: The blog post outlines three different course of actions that could serve as a good starting point for AI regulation. First, the post calls for there to be some form of a coordinating entity that focuses on the safety and smooth integration of AI technologies into society.

value.title: Bill Gates says an under-the-radar startup could be the biggest winner in the AI. Check out its free app, and you'll see why.
value.excerpt: The Microsoft cofounder is betting that whichever company creates the most powerful personal agent will disrupt Amazon, Google Search, and more.

value.title: Google to work with Europe on stop-gap ‘AI Pact’
value.excerpt: Google's Sundar Pichai has agreed to work with lawmakers in Europe on what's being referred to as an "AI Pact" -- seemingly a stop-gap set of voluntary rules or standards while formal regulations are still being worked on.

value.title: Alteryx reimagines data analytics with generative AI
value.excerpt: How will AiDIN generative AI help? AiDIN is an umbrella term for a series of generative AI innovations set to make their way into the Alteryx Cloud Platform portfolio of products.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence May Be Coming For Your Job
value.excerpt: You will need to adapt to the rapid changes brought on by AI by continually educating and upskilling yourself or asking your employer to enroll you in courses.
